name: Jubba Hunter
description:
Capture footage of the Jubbas before your camera runs out of memory!

As an avid researcher of the mythical and mystical, you've been tasked with exploring the Misty Moon Forest in search of physical evidence of the the fabled Jubbas, the Forest's adorable, glowing (and extremely rare!) inhabitants. 

But there's a catch - the camera you need to do the job has limited memory available! Discover new species and capture footage of the Jubbas to get the job done before your camera's memory is filled. 

An Epic MegaJam 2021 submission by Bethany Kelly, Lukasz Kyc and Nicola Hynes.
